body_html:
I made a change in CMakeLists.txt some time ago and the define that was breaking gpu builds should be gone (there was a define passed to nvcc which broke nvcc but that define was only used to generate version.cc) so I moved it and its no longer passed to nvcc.
All cmake versions better than 3.6 should work now. I use 3.8 on my box and its fine.

body:
I made a change in CMakeLists.txt some time ago and the define that was breaking gpu builds should be gone (there was a define passed to nvcc which broke nvcc but that define was only used to generate version.cc) so I moved it and its no longer passed to nvcc.
All cmake versions better than 3.6 should work now. I use 3.8 on my box and its fine.
